before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"3chqo","text":"LI Detector analytical pipeline can only be applied to experiments conducted in accordance to the LI Detector experimental pipeline. Please refer to the LI Detector manuscript for best practices on conducting the colony-based high-throughput experiment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

47187.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8eknt","text":"Execute Step 1 to 7 of the LI Detector Analytical Pipeline","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":31}],"data":{}},{"key":"l6mr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56an","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qp5p","text":"Note: The order of the plates in the upscale pattern from Step 6 of the pipeline should be the same as the order of images within the folders.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4A1ED1C06BF711EB8E674393CB6DEF8E","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/21D4D9D12A7E11EBAB590A58A9FEAC2A"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54rdo","text":"Photos should be organized as Experiment \u003e Arm \u003e Stage \u003e Hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b8qd","text":"Within the Hours folder the photos should be arranged in the same order as the plate names/number","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hj1d","text":"Example","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgr1e","text":"        - Photos for the Starter Plates and Pre-screen were taken at saturation and those for Final Screen were taken at 0, 4 and 12 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hdno","text":"        - {"blocks":[{"key":"a20mc","text":"Successful completion of this command will generate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoj10","text":"_RAW = raw colony size estimations per hour per position id of all the images","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drb6f","text":"_smudgebox = position ids to be excluded from analysis that correspond to the user defined coordinates","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a50vv","text":"_JPEG = clean version of the raw table with border colonies, colonies corresponding to the smudge box and those colonies with pixel count of less than 10 NULL'd","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jb07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ukcl","text":"Example files can be found in Data.zip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":8}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C897E39A6BF611EB84BB0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://github.com/sauriiiin/lidetector/blob/master/Data.zip"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ddd","text":"Image Quality Check","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1l8f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67q29","text":"Are all the images in the right orientation? - top left corner of the plate should be at the top left corner of the image.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp6g8","text":"Are there the expected number of images in your folders?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5it1","text":"Do all the images have a uniform black background? Any 'white' in the background will cause the MATLAB Colony Analyzer Toolkit (MCAT) to falsely select it as a colony and fail.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p73p","text":"Make sure that all the images are ordered correctly.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc7e0","text":"Take note of any 'smudges' or problem colonies on the plates. One might consider adding these to the smudgebox when prompted.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"anbfk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2prmq","text":"The LI Detector framework consists of integrated experimental and analytical pipelines. A. The pin-copy-upscale experimental pipeline from frozen glycerol stocks (top) to imaging (bottom). Each box represents a pinning step, and the steps within the sky-blue highlighted portion can be repeated until the desired colony density is reached. Illustrations to the right of the flowchart is a simplified representation of four experimental plates. A reference population (grey) is introduced on every plate during the first upscale step. The analytical pipeline uses this population for spatial bias correction and relative fitness estimations for the mutant strains of interest (purple). B. Workflow of the analysis pipeline where columns from left to right represent user inputs, analytical steps, and outputs. User inputs consist of raw colony size estimates and the strain layout of the plates. The analytical pipeline performs: i) local artifact correction, ii) source normalization, iii) reference-based background colony size estimation using a 2-dimensional linear interpolation, iv) corrects for spatial bias by dividing the local artifact corrected colony sizes with the background colony sizes and provides a measure of relative fitness, and iv) assigns empirical p-values using the reference strain relative fitness distribution. The outputs include local artifact corrected colony sizes, background colony sizes, spatially corrected relative fitness, and mutant strains identified as having a mean colony size that is significantly larger or smaller than the reference strain.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":86},{"style":"bold","offset":88,"length":2},{"style":"bold","offset":685,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"CD10AC6035CA11EBAE190F1AACF1AB07","height":252,"id":344440,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"FIGURE1.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/private/d818d1e1e59734cba1f6ff7932515a58d0e1f5dcf2db7c3e8de13239298646d7/csp2bhge7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ksm2bhge7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ksmzbhge7.webp","width":550}}}}

G3 Genes|Genomes|Genetics, 11(2). https://doi.org/10.1093/g3journal/jkaa068","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":207,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"03D28125B3B111ED9DDB0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1093/g3journal/jkaa068"}}}}
